subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Kevin Harvick is quietly finishing in the top five most weeks and settling in at No. 2 in the Sprint Cup points race as he pursues an elusive series championship.
snippet: Kevin Harvick is quietly finishing in the top five most weeks and settling in at No. 2 in the Sprint Cup points race as he pursues an elusive series championship.
